name: Carter Smith
description: Carter Smithwas anArasakacomputer specialist working directly as V's assistant, should V choose the Corpo lifepath.He is a capable technology specialist, but dislikes working for the Arasaka Corporation, finding their methods unethical. Carter was employed by the Arasaka Corporation's Counterintelligence Division inNight City, helmed byArthur Jenkins. Carter's mother, Mary, was extremely proud of his success, although Carter was disgusted with the objectives required by Jenkins of his employees.
